abstract: Former Mount Pleasant, NY, Police Chief Brian Fanelli pleads guilty to child pornography charge; faces up to 10 years in prison and $250,000 fine when he is sentenced in November.
lead_paragraph: Brian Fanelli, who led the Mount Pleasant agency, admitted to using home computers to swap photos and videos of children as young as 7 engaged in sex acts.

headline.main: Ex-Police Chief in Westchester County Pleads Guilty to Child Pornography Charge
headline.print_headline: Ex-Police Chief Pleads Guilty to Child Pornography Charge

snippet: Brian Fanelli, who led the Mount Pleasant agency, admitted to using home computers to swap photos and videos of children as young as 7 engaged in sex acts.
